law.text: Within sixty (60) days after the close of each fiscal year, the board shall make to the county judge/executive and to the mayor of the city of the first class, for transmission to the fiscal court of the county and to the legislative body of the city, respectively, a report of the fiscal and other operations of the board and of the home for the previous fiscal year, accompanied by information and tables showing the character and extent of such operations.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-8.
